185957782.review:
Umineko Golden Fantasia is a kind of fun, gimmicky fighting game, but it’s pretty easy to tell this was a budget doujin-style project. Probably not the type of game most people would want to play seriously at a competitive level.

I will say, having all the music from the visual novel and some fun character interactions is a nice touch. But ultimately, it’s just okay fan service and not much more than that.

It’s really only worth it for hardcore Umineko fans who at least sort of like 2D fighting games. For anyone else, it’s probably not worth the time. 

At least it has rollback.

They reach beyond eternity
The world begins to move again
and sins fall together with the rain
Time speaks of the tragedy forever to the defiers
I'll find the piece from that day
Before your hands and my arms are dyed in golden blood.
